text: The police said Saturday both were dead at the scene of the explosion the day before, but the police delayed announcing the death of 51-year-old Senior Trooper William Hakim so his family could be notified. At a briefing, the police identified the Woodburn police officer who died as 51-year-old Capt. Tom Tennant. Woodburn's police chief, 46-year-old Scott Russell, is in a Portland hospital, in critical condition. State police say the inside of the West Coast Bank branch office was extensively damaged. The police say they do n't have suspects.
title: Oregon State Police say a bomb explosion at a Woodburn-area bank killed a local police officer and a state bomb disposal technician.
